description: In the step to add media (photo, video, text), you can see a button to 'Add Logo' in top left corner of page, besides the button to 'Change Style'. Click on it to add the logo and its appearances.
title: How do I add a logo to my slideshow?
description_text: In the step to add media (photo, video, text), you can see a button to 'Add Logo' in top left corner of page, besides the button to 'Change Style'. Click on it to add the logo and its appearances.

description: As of now, we have this feature preserved for the API clients only.
title: Can I add my logo as a watermark to the videos?
description_text: As of now, we have this feature preserved for the API clients only.
